title: Silver 4 looking for a duo partner!
body:
Hi Y'all!

I'm currently a Silver 4 jungle main, but i'll play pretty much anywhere. I'm looking for someone to duo with whilst simultaneously (that's a big word to make me look smart) having a laugh, climbing the ladder and making scrubs question their life choices.

Before applying, here are a few things you MUST fulfill:

 - Be Silver 5 or higher.

 - Be willing to have a laugh, and stay positive even when were losing.

- Have an Englishmens affinity for tea and biscuits. {{item:2010}} 

- Be able to cop criticism, and also give some out. If we're in silver, we definitely need it.

- Be MATURE, but not too boring. Don't go raging at people like a twelvie.

[Some form of voice chat, Skype, TeamSpeak, Curse Voice etc is required.]

Since we'll potentially be duoing a lot together, it would be preferable to get to know each other. The following is a list of activities that would be desirable:

- Watching eSports together! (LCS, IEM etc, tbh whatever is on)

- Constructive and intellectual conversations about tea's.

- Playing the odd twisted treeline or ARAM for laughs.

If you're interested in becoming apart of my life (league circlejerk) either leave a brief summary about yourself below, or contact me on the following:

Skype:  **hooliagn370** (Judge my gameplay, not my spelling)
League:  **Samska**
Curse: **Hooligan370** (Again, an old username, don't judge me)

Look forward to hearing from you, and good luck on the Fields of Justice!

-Samska

replies.body: Yo mama is so proud of u. if only you can use half the effort that you put in to writing this in your school work and getting a LIFE.
It's times like these that make me question our friendship.
